description:
Accepting clients by appointment only from our law office in Palmdale, California, the attorneys at Larson, Larson, & Dauer are fully prepared to help you secure the maximum amount of compensation you deserve for the injuries you sustained as the result of a workplace accident or due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Along with handling all types of workers' compensation and personal injury claims, we also provide exceptional and effective advocacy and support to those who have experienced serious employment law violations, such as discrimination, harassment, wrongful termination, wage and hour disputes, and other similar issues.

For more than 40 years now, our law firm has served the good people of the greater Los Angeles metro region, including Mission Hills and Sherman Oaks, and our attorneys possess the extensive knowledge and resources necessary to help you resolve your conflicts and find solutions for your legal matters efficiently.

Over the course of our history, we have recovered over $500 million dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients. We have achieved this level of success through our unwavering commitment to those we serve, and we promise to provide the personalized attention your case deserves to help you secure the finances you need to support yourself and your family now that you can no longer work.

No matter the circumstances surrounding your claim or the complexity of you needs, we will sit with you and fully assess your matter. If we feel you have a case, we will do all we can to help you secure the maximum amount of compensation possible so that you can cover your medical bills, lost wages and other expenses associated with your accident or work-related grievance.

To discuss your matter at no cost, you can contact Larson, Larson, & Dauer by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation.
